title: Judge Dredd: The Apocalypse War
description: Apocalypse Now!Anarchy is never far from the streets of Mega-City One, but a sudden spate of ferocious block wars takes Justice Department by surprise - what could be behind this outbreak of utter insanity that's threatening to destabilise the metropolis? When Dredd discovers the cause, it will leading an even greater nightmare - one that will see millions perish in a nuclear holocaust...
author: John Wagner
